guild.description:
A place to read and share positive and uplifting, feel good news stories.

Rules:

1. Please be civil, you are free to discuss everything you'd like as long as you do not act in bad faith and retain insults and bad manners.

2. Stay on-topic. This is uplifting news. News that are supposed to be happy and encourage everyone. If you want general news you can head to +News.
guild.description_html:
A place to read and share positive and uplifting, feel good news stories.

Rules:

  1. Please be civil, you are free to discuss everything you'd like as long as you do not act in bad faith and retain insults and bad manners.

  2. Stay on-topic. This is uplifting news. News that are supposed to be happy and encourage everyone. If you want general news you can head to +News.
guild.name: UpliftingNews

title: Elderly dog with the ‘cutest shuffle’ rescued from being euthanized after CA wildfires burned home
